title: NEMA Summer Picnic 2025
description: Come join the summertime fun with NEMA Picnic 2025! Dosa Station with Ghee Roast, Masala Dosa Egg Dosa, and BBQ station with Hot Dogs, Soda and Ice Cream! Coem play volleyball, Throw ball, tug of war, flag football, and short distance races. Kids will enjoy face painting, kite flying, frisbee, bubbles, and soccer. Purchase tickets today!

title: Team walk for Cancer Care 2025
description: This 3-mile, family-friendly walk supports cancer patients by funding medications, wigs, transportation, support services, and more. Please join Team NEMA for the 3-Mile Walk and help raise funds that provide vital services, emotional support, and hope to cancer patients during their battle. Free parking is available at Ayotte Garage. Jog, bike, skate, or walkâ€”dogs on leashes are welcome too!
